data.title: Interlinking research: The Big Exchange project
data.abstract: The Big Exchange project investigates large-scale exchange systems in Eurasia and Africa (8000-1 BC). We concentrate on raw materials of known origin ('sourced finds'). Network analysis of tools and artificial intelligence methods are used to analyse the combined data sets. We invite broad collaboration on bimodal exchange networks.
data.keywords: economic archaeology, Linderbandkeramik Culture, Neolithic spread, networks in archaeology, raw material exchange
